Description: The following statement contains a magic number: try              {                  if (args.Count() < 1) throw new Exception("Usage: Sum <filename> [m]emorymapped");                  string filename = args[0];                  bool memoryMapped = args.Count() >= 2                                          ? args[1].StartsWith("m"' StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase)                                          : false;                    var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();                  double sum;                  if (memoryMapped)                  {                      sum = RunMemoryMapped(filename);                  }                  else                  {                      sum = Run(filename);                  }                  sw.Stop();                  Console.WriteLine("sum=" + sum);                  Console.WriteLine("execution time = " + sw.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds + "ms");              }              catch (Exception ex)              {                  Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);              }
